column10:
Note: To add a new relic with ease.
Select any row from below this box
to the last, Copy it,
Select Insert 1 row below,
Then paste the copied row.
You can now adjust the new rows.
Colours will change automatically.

To update original Sorting (Expand B-C)
1st.        Set Column C (P#) to A-Z 
2nd.        Set Column B (Rarity) ro A-Z
